mapper.select: select * from MY_COMMENT where BOARD_NO=#{board_no} and BOARD_TYPE='TOUR_DIARY' order by REFER, STEP
select COUNT(*) from MY_COMMENT where BOARD_NO= #{board_no} and BOARD_TYPE='TOUR_DIARY' and LEV= #{lev}
select MAX(STEP) from (select STEP from MY_COMMENT where BOARD_NO=#{board_no} and BOARD_TYPE='TOUR_DIARY' and REFER= #{refer} and LEV = #{lev})
mapper.insert: insert into MY_COMMENT values(MY_COMMENT_SEQ.nextval, #{email}, #{board_no}, 'TOUR_DIARY', #{comment_content}, SYSDATE, MY_COMMENT_SEQ.currval, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update MY_COMMENT set STEP = STEP +1 where BOARD_NO=#{board_no} and BOARD_TYPE='TOUR_DIARY' and REFER=#{refer} and STEP >= #{step}
